channel.title: CVE Feed for Michael Uno (miunosoft) -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Michael Uno (miunosoft) -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-47520|2024-08-02T21:09:37.238Z -- michael%20uno%20%28miunosoft%29 -- responsive%20column%20widgets
item.description: Unauth. Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Michael Uno (miunosoft) Responsive Column Widgets plugin <= 1.2.7 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-52175|2024-08-02T22:55:40.290Z -- michael%20uno%20%28miunosoft%29 -- auto%20amazon%20links%20%E2%80%93%20amazon%20associates%20affiliate%20plugin
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Michael Uno (miunosoft) Auto Amazon Links – Amazon Associates Affiliate Plugin allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Auto Amazon Links – Amazon Associates Affiliate Plugin: from n/a through 5.1.1.

item.title: CVE-2023-45762|2024-08-02T20:29:32.276Z -- michael%20uno%20%28miunosoft%29 -- responsive%20column%20widgets
item.description: URL Redirection to Untrusted Site ('Open Redirect') vulnerability in Michael Uno (miunosoft) Responsive Column Widgets.This issue affects Responsive Column Widgets: from n/a through 1.2.7.
